  1. The Town of Wellington is a statutory town governed by the Board of Trustees. The Board meets on the 2nd and 4th Tuesday of each month at 7:30 p.m. in the Leeper Center.

    Read More

  1. Did you know you can subscribe to CAC's calendar and receive emails when events are added? CAC is planning fun events this year, please visit our page to learn more.


  1. The Wellington Colorado Main Streets Program is an organized group of pro-active citizens whose goal is to promote, enhance, and develop downtown Wellington for the benefit of its inhabitants, businesses, and visitors.
